author: LukasEbeling
body:
#### PR description:
This PR adds for the topological trigger for the L1 Menu parsing 

#### PR main changes:
new:
- `TOPOConditions.h` and  `TOPOConditions.cc` running the model inference 
- `TOPOTemplate.h` auxiliary definitions (just as for AXO and CICADA)

changed:
- TOPO added to menu parsing 

#### PR validation:
To be done, hence PR draft only
title: Topological Trigger - Emulator for L1 Menu parsing added
